players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and found out Bob is mafia. We need to act fast."
Diana: "I am innocent and need your help to find the mafia. Please consider voting for Bob tonight."
You: "Vote for Diana tonight, she's the only one who didn't try to frame me."
Diana: "I am innocent and need your support. I believe Charlie's findings, Bob seems suspicious to me."
Charlie: "I will vote for Bob tonight. He seems the most suspicious to me, and Charlie's findings support this."
